issue.title: [C++] Remove FutureWaiter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17126](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17126). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`FutureWaiter` and dependent APIs (`FutureIterator`, `WaitForAll`, `WaitForAny`).

Removing `FutureWaiter` would significantly simplify the `Future` implementation, making it also more maintainable and potentially faster.
